title: FAQ
subtitle: Things I get asked a lot

questions.title: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: I offer a range of services including web design, content creation and photography. I can also help with SEO and branding.

questions.title: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: I mainly use Nuxt.js to make websites and Express for backend applications.

questions.title: What kind of photography do you do?
questions.answer: I mainly do cityscape and landscape photography. But I also shoot subjects from time to time.

questions.title: What equipment do you use?
questions.answer: I use a Canon 750d with a nifty fifty 50mm f1.8
